sentences.sContent: In some cases, the corresponding IT Governance is non-existent or weak, and it is then necessary to do some of the governance work that should have already completed.
sentences.sContent_eng: In some cases, the corresponding IT Governance is non-existent or weak, and it is then necessary to do some of the governance work that should have already completed.
sentences.sCn: 在某些情况下，相应的 IT 治理是不存在的，或者非常薄弱，那么就有必要进行一些本应该已经完成的治理工作。

words.tran: 存在主义的；有关存在的；存在判断的
存在，实在；生存，生活；存在物，实在物
存在；生存；生活；继续存在

trans.tranOther: something that is real and exists
